q: SKY PRESENTERS APOLOGISE FOR SEXIST COMMENTS Sky football presenters Andy Coulson Gray and Richards Richard Keys have been suspended by Sky Sports after being caught by an open microphone making off-air comments about lineswoman Sian Massey at the Wolves-Liverpool game on Saturday. Somebody better get down there and explain offside to her, Richard Keys said.`` Can you believe that?'' Gray responded.`` A female linesman. Women don't know the offside rule.''
